structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Legislative findings on review and evaluation of current system of services and supports for persons with an intellectual disability and other developmental disabilities -- Construction of KRS 210.570 to 210.577.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 92, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 21, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 403, sec. 1, effective April 14, 2000.
